scripts.pm2:start: pm2 start npm --name inlet-db -- run server && pm2 start npm --name inlet-client -- run dev -- --port 5175
scripts.backup: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const d=new Date();const p=s=>String(s).padStart(2,'0');const name=p(d.getFullYear()%100)+p(d.getMonth()+1)+p(d.getDate())+'_'+p(d.getHours())+p(d.getMinutes())+p(d.getSeconds());fs.copyFileSync('db.json','src/documents/'+name+'.json');console.log('Saved: src/documents/'+name+'.json')"
